      • getLocalizedMessage

        public static java.lang.String getLocalizedMessage(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the message from the .properties to the key using Spring methods. If Spring is not set up properly yet -> messageSource = null [would be set by init()] fallback to old function
        Parameters:
        key - the key from the .properties file
        Returns:
        localized message if a .properties file is existing for the actual locale

        type - 0 = INFO
        1 = WARNING
        2 = ERROR
